entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 26.

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
